s9.message: Make this payment a monthly contribution

s2.message:
Adblock Plus is - and will always be - free. Our mission is to provide users with tools that allow them to gain control over their Internet browsing and protect them from unwanted and malicious elements.
  Your donation directly helps the development of Adblock Plus.

s12.message: To cancel your monthly payment, click the link below that corresponds to how you donated:

s11.message: You can receive a refund within 120 days of payment. Please send an email to {1}.
